casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 29, 2014

[Cite as 05/29/2014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-2257.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-0866. State ex rel. Kolby v. Youngstown City Council.

In Mandamus. Upon consideration of relators’ motion to enlarge time to submit their brief and *1409proposed findings of fact and conclusions of law, it is ordered that the time for filing the brief and proposed findings of fact and conclusions of law is hereby extended to July 18, 2014. All other deadlines are adjusted in accordance with the timeframes set out by the April 9, 2014 scheduling order.

/s/ ANDREW J. CAMPBELL Special Master
